getAllItems

  • getAllItems(__namedParameters: { cluster: Cluster; constraint?: ConstraintFunction }): any[]

getInflluencing

  • getInflluencing(__namedParameters: { cluster: Cluster; constraint?: ConstraintFunction; eps?: number; root: Cluster }): IHMatrix[]

  • Get all influcing matrices of a given cluster, starting at root and under a specific constraint (if specified)

getLeafs
